item.title: [LIM3][Dedicated Servers] - Room 313
item.description:
Nov 17, 14:00 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 17/11/2022 12:45 UTC
End Time : 17/11/2022 13:51 UTC
Service impacted : The services was unreachable.
Root cause : The incident is due to an eletrical equipment was crashed during a periodic generator test.

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [EU/CA][Dedicated Servers] - Distribution
item.description:
Nov 17, 09:51 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 17/11/2022 02:20 UTC
End Time : 17/11/2022 06:02 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 17, 04:05 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 17/11/2022 02:20 UTC
Service impact : We are currently experiencing issues on installation of Ubuntu distribution.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [RBX1][Infrastructure] - Rack 16D01
item.description:
Nov 17, 07:34 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 17/11/2022 07:16 UTC
End Time : 17/11/2022 07:28 UTC
Root cause : Electrical malfunction
Servers in rack 16D01 were unreachable due to an unexpected disjunction.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.
